DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether intramuscular naloxone 0.4mg . effective prophylaxis intrathecal morphine induce pruritus cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Intramuscular Naloxone 0.4mg . Prophylaxis Intrathecal Morphine Induced Pruritus After Cesarean Section
DOC.criteria: patient schedule cesarean section ASA class 1 contraindication spinal block complicate pregnancy history drug abuse pregnancy obesity BMI > 35kg./m2
